description: Easy & powerful bot to check if your all Telegram bots are working or not. This bot status bot updates every 5 minutes & runs for 24x7 hours.
keywords: How to check your bots are alive or not

SESSION_STRING.description: A valid Pyrogram session string from @sukunxstringbot

BOT_LISTS.description: Your bot username list without '@' (Example: Groupcontrollertgbot Adventure_Robot CHATGPTAI_TG_BOT forcesubscribe12bot AllStringHack_Bot allString_gen_bot LifeGameTBot  Cccheakertgbot Jee_Neet_Study_Material_Bot)

CHANNEL_ID.description: Your channel's or group's Telegram id (Example: -1001246808642)

GRP_ID.description: Your Group Id To Send Warnings.

MESSAGE_ID.description: Telegram id of message from your channel or group (Example: 10)
